body.name: KOOTION USB C Flash Drive 128GB 2 in 1 OTG USB 3.0/USB Type C Thumb Drive Dual Drive USB C Memory Stick for Smartphone/Laptop/Tablet/PC - 128G, Blue
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 21 hrs 46 mins
features: 【2 in 1: USB C + USB 3.0】128GB usb c flash drive has dual ports, usb 3.0 port is applied to all devices which have usb 3.0 interface and usb c port is widely used in all Android smartphones with OTG function. You can transfer easily data bewteen different devices* Note: Make sure your smartphone is equipped with OTG function and need to open OTG function in Settings when you plug memory stick

【High Speed up to 90 MB/S】Read speed: up to 90 MB / s, Write speed: up to 30 MB / s, the speed of USB 3.0 interface is 10 times faster than USB interface 2.0, save time to wait, increases work productivity. *Note: Speed will be limited if you use the USB key in the USB 2.0 interface

【Large Compatibility】 The USB 3.0 Connector is compatible with USB 3.0 & USB 2.0 backward USB 1.1 devices, such as Laptop, Desktop, Car Audio, Tablet, TV, Speakers, Projector. USB-C port is compatible with all Android Smartphones.

【Expand Storage】 Good performance in storing, transferring and sharing digital data with families, friends, colleagues, customers. It can expand the capacity of your smartphone, you can watch movies or take pictures when you go on vacation with your family and friends.

【Kindly Customer Services】 please feel free to contact us if you have any problem on our usb keys, we will do our best to solve your problem, the customer is the first position in our heart. We are always behind our products and customers to make sure that you are all fully satisfied.
body.description: KOOTION USB C Flash Drive 128 GB Keep Your Beautiful Moments and Unforgettable Memory * Available in Blue, 32 GB, 64GB, 128GB * Light, foldable and convenient * High quality aluminum alloy shell and stylish chic apparence * Plug and play, no need to install software to plug usb memory stick * Every flash drive is checked strictly before shipment to make sure product quality Specification: Brand: KOOTION Color:Blue Capacity: 128 GB Product Dimensions: 5.4*1.6*0.76cm Product Weight: 10g Package Dimensions:12*12*1.2 cm Package Weight: 15g Interface Type: USB C+ USB 3.0 Compatibility: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7, Vista, Linux, Mac OS 10.3 and above, all devices are equipped with a USB port: desktop, laptop, tablet, player, TV, automobile, speakers, all android smartphones with otg function Operating System: Windows ME/NT/ 2000/XP/7/8, Linux, Mac OS Working Temperatures: -30º C to 70º C Storage Temperature: -20 º C to 85ºC Warranty and Service: 1 years warranty and 24 hours on line customer services Package Content: One 128 GB USB C Flash Drive Kindly Notes: 1.Actual storage is less than the capacity that listed on the page. 1GB = 1,000,000,000 bytes. 2.The read/write speed is based on internal testing and may vary from the capacity, host devices, systems and application.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good material works well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes a great live boot drive
reviews.reviewText: It's hard to find a small drive for a bootable usb these days. Bigger is not always better if it's going to be wasted. Dual USB c and usb3.0 compatibility is perfect and the price was great for a drive I wanted to play with

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars First one defective, but replacement works great.
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty nice 3.0 USB. This is a great thumb drive to have for if you need a quick transfer of larger files or a back up for pictures and videos. The first one I received unfortunately did not want to stay connected to my PC. I thought maybe it was my computer but after receiving the replacement it worked beautifully. It does have a small loop I would say you could be a string through so you can put this on your keys or on a lanyard. The major down side of doing this is that the metal is very easy to scratch. Just a few seconds with your keys pressing against and you will notice the scratches on it so be aware of that. The thumb drive itself fits pretty well into the slot and will not be easily unplugged. It is not too thick where it will take up more than one slot so you can easily plug this in other devices if needed. The turning mechanism of the USB thumb drive is pretty sturdy so it will not just turn from the head weight of the thumb drive or by accident. Another thing I will note about this product is that it is relatively big compared to many other thumb drives on the market. Again the silver like layer is also very easy to scratch so know that if you are going to put these on your keys. It is thin enough where it will not take up too much space. I did do a test and verified that this thumb drive indeed has 128 gigabyte capacity and the transfer speed is not too bad. The writing speed was about 64 MB/s and the reading speed was 45 MB/s which is okay for a 3.0 USB drive. I would say that it all varies as well on the port you plug into as well. You have plenty of space to work with and transferring should not take too long, but you may be able to fill up 64 gb pretty quickly. I Overall this is a nice thumb drive to have for storing pictures and videos but be aware with the sizes of videos and pictures you may actually fill this up pretty fast. Compared to other usb 3.0 thumb drives, it has okay transfer speed. Again it is a nice side USB drive to have to store photos and family videos for long term. A down side of this product is that the swivel actually becomes really loose after running the device for long periods. I think it is from the heat and the gear. It became really loose to the point it would not close again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great on my Chromebook
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t want to spend a lot of money for a flash drive for my Chromebook as I was concerned it wouldn’t work. This works great! It showed up right away on my screen and I was able to save to the drive without any issues. The files also open without any problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it !!
reviews.reviewText: I often switch between MacBook and my work laptop and this gives me an ease to switch between the two. Doesn’t corrupt files. I love it ! Before I had this I was using another gadget that used extra wires. This usb is perfect !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working after couple of tries
reviews.reviewText: Used this drive to back up few folders from my old mac. It worked fine first time, i.e. the drive was detected on my new mac.Tried it the second time. Now both the macs do not recognize this drive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked great for Steam Deck!
reviews.reviewText: Used this little bugger to reimage the Steam Deck after a SSD upgrade. Easy peasy.

reviews.reviewTitle: タイプAーC使えるのが良い
reviews.reviewText: 車買ったらUSBがタイプCだったので通常のが使えず検索して見つけましたPCでタイプAで記録し車でCで使用問題なく使えています値段も安いしすぐ届きました
スマホとPCの連携にと当然ですが問題なく利用していますスピード関しては計測していないので分かりませんが私にはこれで満足

La memoria es pequeña, en el USB C es más veloz que el USB A 3.0, como era de esperarse. El único pero que le pongo es que al conectarlo por el lado del USB C hace un clic y no entra hasta el fondo, sin embargo, no tiene problemas de conexión
typeA、C両方対応なので何かと便利です。

reviews.reviewTitle: 幅ひろく使えて便利です
reviews.reviewText: USBのCにもAにも対応する為各装置に便利に使えます。いままでは変換ケーブルなどで複雑でしたがこれで各機種に使えてよかったです。
